hello um I got a weird thing happeneing here I got a bug occurring to where the building on the menu are max tier but when I go into launching or when I start building there back to tier 1 buildings again can you please fix this im going to post a vid on this to this so you see what I see to help sove this issue

Lego8_bit

Hello Lego8_bit, the 64bit Windows version of KSP is known to be broken in career mode, there is no fix for this.

Please see the FAQ and all the other threads on this issue.

I better close this, actually I should merge all these threads...
